product_name: TYR Pink Special Ops Goggles - Women's
long_description: The TYR Pink Special Ops Swim goggles offer a comfortable, secure fit to open-water swimmers and triathletes. Polarized lenses block horizontal sun rays that bounce off the top of the water; antifog, mirrored lenses with darkish tint are great on sunny days. Lightweight and virtually shatterproof, polycarbonate lenses are 20 times more impact resistant than glass and one-third the weight. Unibody frame and simple nose bridge system accommodates a wide variety of facial types; design offers a wide, peripheral view. Silicone gaskets seal out water for a comfortable fit that maintains its original shape swim after swim. Silicone strap conforms to sides of head, and flat back straps allow a secure fit; strap is easy to adjust. TYR will donate up to $5.00 from each TYR Pink Special Ops Swim goggles purchase to the Breast Cancer Research Foundation (BCRF). BCRF is dedicated to preventing breast cancer and finding a cure in our lifetime by funding clinical and translational research worldwide.
short_description: The TYR Pink Special Ops Swim goggles offer a comfortable, secure fit to open-water swimmers and triathletes.
